reviewText: What forms a person's opinion on politics? Are people willing or able to accept new ideas that differ from their ingrained opinions.. The old blacksmith in Kansas had more wisdom than most of the Country. He says.. "The Fat-Farmer down at the City Cafe just got his hundred thousand dollar Government check for Not rasising wheat on ground that he set aside in a government program to support wheat prices... And he complains about some Black woman down in New Orleans getting shoes for her children after hurricane Katrina..
